programme.title: Шуша
programme.desc: Главная героиня – эксперт-криминалист Александра Ладынина, которая живет ради любимой работы и верит только фактам. Но ее жизнь переворачивается в тот момент, когда в их отдел переводится майор полиции Илья Власов – давний знакомый Шуши.

programme.title: Шуша
programme.desc: Главная героиня – эксперт-криминалист Александра Ладынина, которая живет ради любимой работы и верит только фактам. Но ее жизнь переворачивается в тот момент, когда в их отдел переводится майор полиции Илья Власов – давний знакомый Шуши.

programme.title: Шуша
programme.desc: Главная героиня – эксперт-криминалист Александра Ладынина, которая живет ради любимой работы и верит только фактам. Но ее жизнь переворачивается в тот момент, когда в их отдел переводится майор полиции Илья Власов – давний знакомый Шуши.

programme.title: Шуша
programme.desc: Главная героиня – эксперт-криминалист Александра Ладынина, которая живет ради любимой работы и верит только фактам. Но ее жизнь переворачивается в тот момент, когда в их отдел переводится майор полиции Илья Власов – давний знакомый Шуши.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Криминалисты Макаров, Ройзман и Ким выезжают "на тело". Макаров – новый нач.лаборатории ЭКЦ. На месте он знакомится со следователем Богданой Ковальской и операми Щегловым (Демоном) и Киценко. Версии Богданы и Макарова расходятся, но уступать ни один из них не хочет. Богдана встречается с судебным прокурором Игорем Карпенко, но он женат и трепещет перед своей женой Аллой, хотя и постоянно обещает Богдане развестись. Алла подозревает мужа в измене, но доказательств у нее нет. Подруга Богданы – Вера – с интересом относится к появлению Макарова. Как оказалось, Макарова на должность "продвинул" его бывший коллега и друг – полковник Туманов. У Макарова происходят столкновения с Богданой на профессиональной почве. Месяц назад убили сестру-близнеца Макарова – Иру. Убийцу не нашли, дело закрыли. Макаров собирается сам продолжить расследование, используя допуск к делу, который у него теперь есть.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров приходит к приятелю – Виктору Берштадскому, с которым они дружат с детства. У него своя частная лаборатория "Спектр". Богдана опять забывает забрать дочку Яну из танцевального кружка. С Макаровым она по-прежнему в контрах, однако вынуждена признать, что спец он отличный. В жизни Игоря Карпенко намечается карьерный рост. У Киценко появляется подружка – аспирантка-филолог. В кабинете у Богданы Макаров знакомится с ее дочкой – Яной. Продолжая расследовать убийство сестры Ирины, Макаров вспоминает свой последний разговор с ней. Она рассказала ему, что у нее на операционном столе умер пациент. Макаров выясняет имя погибшего – Илья Кошевой. Богдана признается Карпенко, что устала от их отношений. Ей нужен муж, а Яне – отец. Вечером Макаров встречается в баре с Берштадским. Он уверен, что сестру убили преднамеренно. Подняв дело об убийстве сестры, он увидел, что на щеке у мертвой Иры был след в виде змейки. На снимках, найденных в Интернете, на пальце у жены Ильи Кошевого, Инги, Макаров замечает тяжелое кольцо в виде змейки.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: В лабораторию приходит новый сотрудник – Олеся Бильчак. Макаров недоволен тем, что полковник Туманов прислал к нему столь юную и неопытную сотрудницу. Но Леся – любимая племянница Туманова. Между Лесей и Щегловым возникает симпатия. Ким, Ройзман и Смирнитский разыгрывают Лесю, заперев ее в комнате с трупами и выключив свет. Однако она показывает себя молодцом. Макаров по-прежнему ведет себя с Богданой заносчиво и самоуверенно. Карпенко привозит Богдану в ресторан на окраине города. Но там они натыкаются на подругу Аллы. Чтобы она не заметила их, они сбегают из ресторана, так и не поужинав. Игорь бросает Богдану одну. Богдана рассказывает Вере о том, как Карпенко "кинул" ее в ресторане. Вера советует Богдане, наконец, решиться и бросить Карпенко. Стас Ким выясняет, что Инга Кошевая – кинолог. Макаров едет в клуб кинологов, знакомится с Ингой. Он видит у нее на пальце кольцо со змейкой, приглашает ее попить кофе. А затем незаметно крадет ее стаканчик, чтобы впоследствии снять с него отпечатки пальцев. Это воровство замечает приятель Инги – Олег.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Карпенко приходит к Богдане с букетом цветов и с извинениями. Он кается. Богдана старается "поставить вопрос ребром", но Карпенко заговаривает ей зубы. Леся просит у Макарова, чтобы он доверил ей настоящую работу. Он предлагает ей еще раз тщательно осмотреть труп потерпевшей. Леся осматривает тело жертвы и обнаруживает улику, которую при осмотре упустил криминалист Ройзман. Макаров устраивает Ройзману за это взбучку. Ким заступается за коллегу. В расследовании очередного дела Макаров снова обращается к Берштадскому и рассказывает ему о Инге Кошевой, ее кольце со змейкой и что ее отпечатки пальцев совпадают с отпечатками, найденными на входной двери в квартире Иры. Богдана случайно застает Макарова за разговором с какой-то старушкой, которая просит, чтобы ее "невинно арестованного" внука-инвалида отпустили. Макаров соглашается. Богдана меняет свое мнение о Макарове. Щеглов видит, как Лесю увозит с работы молодой парень-байкер. Киценко начинает его подкалывать. Кинолог Олег рассказывает Инге Кошевой, что выяснил, кто такой Андрей Макаров. Инга обдумывает эту информацию и заявляет Олегу, что намерена нанести Макарову "упреждающий удар".

programme.title: Mīla kemperī
programme.desc: Jaunieši metas izaicinošā mīlas spēlē un dodas ceļojumā cauri visai Eiropai. Tā galvenais mērķis - atrast savu otro pusīti, lai, nokļūstot galamērķī baudītu medusmēneša cienīgu atpūtu! Jāpiebilst, ka balva ir viena, bet mīlai atvērto siržu krietni vairāk... Tāpēc tam, kurš "izrādīsies lieks" un nebūs atradis sev pāri, nāksies doties mājup. Romantiski randiņi, intrigas, negaidīti pavērsieni un visam pa vidu - kaislīgas attiecības un piedzīvojumi realitātes šovā "Mīla kemperī".

programme.title: Jauniņais
programme.desc: Celtniecības darbinieks Džons Nolans piedzīvo bankas aplaupīšanu un reālas nāves briesmas, un tas izrādās dzīvi mainošs notikums. Lai arī Džonam ir jau 45, viņš nolemj kļūt par policistu, lai varētu rūpēties par līdzcilvēku drošību. Viņš pamet mierīgo mazpilsētas dzīvi, veiksmīgi pabeidz kursus un sāk strādāt Losandželosas policijā. Priekšnieks uz Džonu skatās ar aizdomām un neuzticību, jaunie kolēģi - ar vieglu smīnu. Jaunas dzīves sākums pusmūžā nebūs ne viegls, ne vienkāršs, un Džona mēģinājums pierast pie bīstamās, neparedzamās un brīžiem komiskās policistu ikdienas būs piedzīvojumiem bagāts! Galvenajās lomās: Natans Filions, Alisa Diaza, Melisa ONīla.

Galvenajās lomās: Natans Filions, Alisa Diaza, Melisa ONīla.

programme.title: Zem klāja Vidusjūrā
programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Kamēr viesi bauda jūru un sauli, ķer vasaras vēju matos, izklaidējas un līksmo, jahtas komanda dara visu, lai nodrošinātu viesiem augstākās klases servisu. Saspringtas situācijas, sarežģīti lēmumi, smags darbs - pēc stresa pilnām darba dienām prasās atbilstoša atpūta. Dzīve noslēgtā komūnā, ballītes un alkohols dara savu - darbinieku starpā ātri vien veidojas attiecības - gan draudzīgas, gan naidīgas, gan kaislīgi romantiskas. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Zem klāja Vidusjūrā
programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Stila patruļa
programme.desc: Katrs vēlas izskatīties satriecoši, taču ne vienmēr tas izdodas. Tam ir virkne iemeslu - nav laika vai vēlmes, nav stila izjūtas, nav īstā diena vai līdzekļu. Tomēr ir stila "zelta likumi," kuri jāievēro un kuru pārkāpšanai nav attaisnojuma - nekopti nagi un mati, saplēsts vai netīrs, neizgludināts, auguma aprisēm nepiemērots apģērbs, pārspīlēti aksesuāri vai tādi, kuri savu laiku jau sen kā nokalpojuši, sievišķīguma slāpēšana zem mūžīgajām biksēm vai nevīžība apģērba izvēlē. Šos pārkāpumus nedrīkst pieļaut pat, lai tikai iznestu atkritumus vai aizskrietu līdz tuvējam veikalam. Tāpēc Latvijas vadošie stilisti Žanna Dubska, Aleksandrs Pavlovs, Kašers un Alina Keller parādīs, kā ar nelieliem stila knifiņiem divu stundu laikā uzmirdzēt jaunā tēlā un izskatīties daudz labāk. "Stila patruļa" aizturēs stila pārkāpējus, lai pārsteigtu ar patīkamu sodu - žilbinošām pārvērtībām.

programme.title: Baigais numurs
programme.desc: Ilze Buna-Lediņa piedāvā viegli saprotamu pieeju numeroloģijai, skaidrojot, ka katram cilvēkam ir savs unikālais "Baigais numurs" - tas noslēpumainais X faktors, kas ietekmē mūsu izvēles un rīcību. Bet vai šo numuru var tiešām izskaidrot ar numeroloģiju? Vai tas tiešām var palīdzēt mums saprast, kāpēc mēs pieņemam noteiktas izvēles un kā tas atspoguļojas mūsu dzīvē?

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Viņa aizraušanās - noziegumu risināšana. Viņa lielākais talants - tikt ierautam sarežģītās mistērijās, lai kopā ar kapteini Heistingsu un Skotlendjarda galveno inspektoru Japu saliktu notikumus kopā kā puzles gabaliņus, ieraudzītu kopbildi un noskaidrotu vainīgo! Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Imma Tataranni. Likums papēžos
programme.desc: Prokurora vietniece Imma Tatarani strādā Materas pilsētā Itālijas dienvidos. Viņa apveltīta ar asu prātu un slavena ar savu stingro nostāju. Viņas tiešums, spītība un neparastais darba stils nereti kolēģiem nav pa prātam un liek justies neērti, taču tieši šīs īpašības padara viņu par vienu no efektīvākajām izmeklētājām. Katrs izmeklēšanas gadījums atklāj ne tikai noziegumu, bet arī dziļākas sabiedrības problēmas un personīgo drāmu. Paralēli profesionālajiem izaicinājumiem Imma cenšas tikt galā savu sarežģīto ģimenes dzīvi - attiecības ar vīru, pusaudzi meitu un pašas iekšējo pasauli. Galvenajās lomās: Vanesa Skalera, Masimiliano Gallo, Barbara Ronči

programme.title: Imma Tataranni. Likums papēžos
programme.desc: Prokurora vietniece Imma Tatarani strādā Materas pilsētā Itālijas dienvidos. Viņa apveltīta ar asu prātu un slavena ar savu stingro nostāju. Viņas tiešums, spītība un neparastais darba stils nereti kolēģiem nav pa prātam un liek justies neērti, taču tieši šīs īpašības padara viņu par vienu no efektīvākajām izmeklētājām. Galvenajās lomās: Vanesa Skalera, Masimiliano Gallo, Barbara Ronči

programme.title: Smita kungs un kundze
programme.desc: Andželina Džolija un Breds Pits romantiski spraigajā kriminālkomēdijā par algotu slepkavu slepeno dzīvi. Džons un Džeina Smiti ir parasts laulātais pāris, kas dzīvo ikdienišķu laulāto dzīvi tipiskā piepilsētas mājā. Bet viņiem katram ir savs noslēpums - viņi ir slīpēti pasūtījuma slepkavas, kurus algo konkurējošas organizācijas. Viss sagriežas kājām gaisā un izvēršas neaizmirstamā, spraigā un romantiskā piedzīvojumā, kad viņi atklāj šo gadiem glabāto noslēpumu, jo abi saņem nākamo uzdevumu - nogalināt vienam otru!

programme.title: Bezvēsts pazudušās
programme.desc: Gerda ielūdz Konstantīnu uz vakariņām. Pēc tam, kad Agnese sadusmojas un atlaiž muižas pārzini no darba, Silvija viņai atklāj patiesību par Ditu un viņas tumšo pagātni. Henrijs ir norūpējies par Lizu, jo uzskata, ka Pāvels meiteni slikti ietekmē un pamudina uz dzeršanu. Konstantīns nejauši atklāj, ka mazpilsētā ir kāds, kurš zina, kas patiesībā notika ar Viktoriju Markinu.

programme.title: Mīlas nometne
programme.desc: Pieci pāri pārbauda savu jūtu stiprumu! Divi pāri, kas gatavojas spert liktenīgo soli un precēties, vēlas noskaidrot, vai tiešām izvēlējušies pareizo cilvēku, kuram dot solījumu uz mūžu. Trīs jau precēti pāri, kuru attiecībās iestājusies rutīna, vēlas atjaunot seno dzirksti! Viņi visi dodas uz attiecību un mīlestības nometni, kur skaidrībā ar sirds un prāta lietām palīdzēs tikt divi eksperti - ģimenes terapeite Aina Poiša un seksologs Arturs Šulcs. Pāri piedalīsies dažādos attiecību konkursos un atbildēs uz neērtiem jautājumiem ne vien sev un ekspertiem, bet arī pārējiem pāriem, kas vērtēs - cik katrs atklāts bijis. Pāris, kurš nepārliecinās pārējos, ka gatavs strādāt ar savām attiecībām, tiks izbalsots, lai tā vietā nāktu cits.

programme.title: Skats no augšas
programme.desc: Jaunās un godkārīgās Donnas Džensenas karstākā vēlēšanās ir kļūts par stjuarti. Turklāt ne šādu tādu - viņa vēlas kļūt par pavadoni tieši pirmās klases lidojumos. Lai kļūtu par vienu no labākajām un redzētu pasauli, viņa ir gatava uz visu! Donna iestājas kursos, kurus vada ekscentrisks augstas klases stjuarts Džons Vitnijs. Ceļš uz panākumiem ir grūts un sarežģīts, un ne reizi vien liek uzdot jautājumu - vai grūtību dēļ iecerētais sapnis ir jāpalaiž vējā? Galvenajās lomās Gvineta Paltrova un Maiks Maijers.

programme.title: Gudrā blondīne
programme.desc: Efektīgā blondīne Ella Vudsa iemieso visus stereotipus par blondīnēm - rozā stiliņš, mazs sunītis, skaistumkonkursu pieredze, šiks dzīvesveids un šarmants draugs. Liktenīgajā vakarā, kad Ella to vien gaida, lai viņas labi manikirētajā pirkstiņā tiktu uzvilks saderināšanās gredzens, notiek pretējais - mīļotais paziņo, ka Ella ir pārāk nenopietna viņa nākotnes politiskajai karjerai un gaidītā bildinājuma vietā meitene tiek pamesta. Apņēmusies nepadoties, Ella nolemj pieradīt, ka var būt tāda meitene, kādu sev blakus vēlas redzēt bijušais. Viņa iestājas Hārvardas juridiskajā fakultātē, kur ar savu rozā krasu krietni pašķaida pelēko masu. Galvenās blondīnes lomā Rīza Viterspūna.

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Viņa aizraušanās - noziegumu risināšana. Viņa lielākais talants - tikt ierautam sarežģītās mistērijās, lai kopā ar kapteini Heistingsu un Skotlendjarda galveno inspektoru Japu saliktu notikumus kopā kā puzles gabaliņus, ieraudzītu kopbildi un noskaidrotu vainīgo! Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Patiesi stāsti seriālā "Playboy noslēpumi"
programme.desc: Dokumentāls seriāls, kas atklāj glamūrīgās un spožās Hjū Hefnera "Playboy" impērijas tumšo pusi. Hjū Hefners bija veiksmīgs uzņēmējs, atbalstīja vārda brīvību, sieviešu tiesības un ar savu žurnālu mēģināja radīt seksuālu revolūciju, kas sievietes un vīriešus padarītu vienlīdzīgākus. Viņa greznajā savrupnamā dzīvoja modeles, Hjū Hefnera draudzenes, tika rīkotas grandiozas ballītes, kuras apmeklēja ietekmīgi un slaveni viesi, un daudzi par Hefneru izsakās ar apbrīnu. Dokumentālais seriāls atklāj daudz jauna un nepatīkama par "Playboy" aizkulisēm un pašu odiozo Hefneru. Atmiņās dalās bijušās modeles, Hjū Hefnera draugi un laika biedri.

programme.title: Patiesi stāsti seriālā "Playboy noslēpumi"
programme.desc: Dokumentāls seriāls, kas atklāj glamūrīgās un spožās Hjū Hefnera "Playboy" impērijas tumšo pusi. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Kamēr viesi bauda jūru un sauli, ķer vasaras vēju matos, izklaidējas un līksmo, jahtas komanda dara visu, lai nodrošinātu viesiem augstākās klases servisu. Saspringtas situācijas, sarežģīti lēmumi, smags darbs - pēc stresa pilnām darba dienām prasās atbilstoša atpūta. Dzīve noslēgtā komūnā, ballītes un alkohols dara savu - darbinieku starpā ātri vien veidojas attiecības - gan draudzīgas, gan naidīgas, gan kaislīgi romantiskas. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Stila patruļa
programme.desc: Katrs vēlas izskatīties satriecoši, taču ne vienmēr tas izdodas. Tam ir virkne iemeslu - nav laika vai vēlmes, nav stila izjūtas, nav īstā diena vai līdzekļu. Tomēr ir stila "zelta likumi," kuri jāievēro un kuru pārkāpšanai nav attaisnojuma - nekopti nagi un mati, saplēsts vai netīrs, neizgludināts, auguma aprisēm nepiemērots apģērbs, pārspīlēti aksesuāri vai tādi, kuri savu laiku jau sen kā nokalpojuši, sievišķīguma slāpēšana zem mūžīgajām biksēm vai nevīžība apģērba izvēlē. Šos pārkāpumus nedrīkst pieļaut pat, lai tikai iznestu atkritumus vai aizskrietu līdz tuvējam veikalam. Tāpēc Latvijas vadošie stilisti Žanna Dubska, Aleksandrs Pavlovs, Kašers un Alina Keller parādīs, kā ar nelieliem stila knifiņiem divu stundu laikā uzmirdzēt jaunā tēlā un izskatīties daudz labāk. "Stila patruļa" aizturēs stila pārkāpējus, lai pārsteigtu ar patīkamu sodu - žilbinošām pārvērtībām.

programme.title: Stila patruļa

programme.title: Divi vienā
programme.desc: Šonedēļ iepazīsim pāri, kurš ir kopā jau 14 gadus, taču precējušies tikai divus no tiem - Una Ulme un Gaitis Burda. Una ilgus gadus ir bijusi žurnāliste, taču nu Unu var redzēt Instagram, daloties ar savu dzīves redzējumu, savukārt Gaitis uzņem viesus restorānā "Buržujs". Šī ir Unas un Gaita pirmā kopīgā intervija. Gaitis līdz šim izvairījies no publiskas dalīšanās par savu dzīvi un attiecībām, bet šoreiz viņš būs pat ļoti atklāts un emocionāls. Kas ir Unas un Gaita atšķirīgais un kā viņi katrs to saredz un pieņem? Viņi ir daudz strādājuši ar savām attiecībām, piemērojušies un sasnieguši saskanību, bet ne vienmēr ir bijis tik gludi. Kāpēc Unai ir svarīgi būt finansiāli neatkarīgai? Kas Gaiti darīs īpaši emocionālu un ko viņi uzskata par lielāko pārbaudījumu attiecībās?

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Viņa aizraušanās - noziegumu risināšana. Viņa lielākais talants - tikt ierautam sarežģītās mistērijās, lai kopā ar kapteini Heistingsu un Skotlendjarda galveno inspektoru Japu saliktu notikumus kopā kā puzles gabaliņus, ieraudzītu kopbildi un noskaidrotu vainīgo! Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Tēva nolaupītās
programme.desc: Lizbetas Meriditas dzīve apmet kūleni, kad viņas bijušais vīrs nolaupa abu kopīgās meitas un aizved viņas no Amerikas uz Grieķiju. Noskaņota atgūt bērnus par jebkādu cenu, Lizbeta dodas gan uz Grieķiju, gan uz Balto namu, lai panāktu taisnību. Viena nepareiza kustība, un viņas bijušais var pazust uz visiem laikiem kopā ar meitenēm. Divas nepareizas kustības, un viņš var izpildīt savus solījumus nogalināt. Lizbeti vajā atmiņas par pašas bērnībā piedzīvoto nolaupīšanu, likmes pieaug ar katru dienu, un mīlošā māte uz spēles liek visu iespējamo, lai pārvestu savas meitenes mājās. Galvenajās lomās: Sāra Drū, Tara Jelande, Patrisa Gudmana

programme.title: Markuss
programme.desc: Lai apturētu Denisu un viņa izmeklēšanu noziedznieki sāk spēlēt netīru spēli un nolaupa dārgāko, kas Denisam ir - viņa meitu. Markusa audžumāte Lidija uzzina ko tādu, kas mainīs ģimenes dzīvi uz mūžīgiem laikiem.

programme.title: Markuss
programme.desc: Deniss atrod nolaupīto meiteni un nogādā Juļu atpakaļ pie tēva un Polīnas Adrejevnas. Rihards cenšas pārliecināt Lidiju, lai viņi dodas uz ārzemēm atpūtas braucienā kopā ar Markusu, taču jaunā sieviete tam nepiekrīt. Lidija paziņo Rihardam negaidītus jaunumus, kas līdz sirds dziļumiem saviļņo vīrieti.

programme.title: Markuss
programme.desc: Seriāla "Markuss" noslēdzošā sērija - stāsta atrisinājums! Polīna pēc 5 gadu meklējumiem atkal ierauga savu dēlu, taču Lidija ne pārāk priecājas par šo notikumu, jo nevēlas pazaudēt Markusu. Vai jaunais puisis atpazīs savu īsto mammu pēc tik ilgas nošķirtības? Vai ir iespējamas laimīgas beigas?

programme.title: Merilinas Monro slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Leģendārās kinodīvas Merilinas Monro īsā, bet spožā dzīve aprakstīta gan biogrāfiskās grāmatās gan atspoguļota dokumentālās filmās. Viņa palikusi atmiņā ar spilgtām kinolomām un žilbinošu ārieni, tāpat arī ar savu daudz aprunāto pieķeršanos pezidentam Kenedijam un trim laulībām, taču patiesībā Merilinas dzīve bijusi daudz sarežģītāka. To, ko redzēja publika, var saukt par aisberga redzamo daļu. Merilinai Monro bija noslēpumi, kurus viņa sargāja no visas pasaules - garīgi slima māte, kura, pretēji uzskatam, ka ir mirusi, vēl ilgi dzīvoja psihiatrisajā klīnikā, kā arī pārmantotā garīgā slimība no mātes. Tas viss tiek atklāts šajā divdaļīgajā stāstā par Holivudas dīvas Merilinas Monro patieso dzīvi.

programme.title: Koncerts Olga un draudzenes
programme.desc: Grezni tērpi, burvīgā Vecgada atmosfēra, mīlēti mākslinieki, sarkanais paklājs, glāzēs dzirkstī šampanietis un skan skaistākās dziesmas - uz krāšņu gadumijas programmu ielūdz Olga Rajecka! Koncertā Olga un draudzenes" kopā ar Olgu Rajecku uz skatuves kāps Aija Andrejeva, Kristīne Zadovska, Ance Krauze un grupa "Dāmu pops" pilnā sastāvā - Ieva Akuratere, Edīte Bauškeniece un Maija Lūsēna, kā arī pavadošā mūziķu grupa.

programme.title: Ezera sonāte. Atjaunotā versija
programme.desc: Pilsētnieks Rūdolfs atvaļinājuma laiku grib pavadīt lauku klusumā un mierā, pie ezera… Tur viņš satiek skolotāju Lauru - divu bērnu māti, kuras vīrs ir cietumā. Rūdolfs nepaliek vienaldzīgs, arī Laura atsaucas viņa jūtām. Laurai sākas dziļš iekšējs konflikts - viņa nespēj atteikties no jaunā jūtu sabangojuma, nespēj nedomāt par Rūdolfu, bet saprot arī, ka nedrīkst nodot savu vīru Riču, kas cietumā izcieš sodu par satiksmes negadījumu. Rūdolfā iemīlas arī Vija - Lauras vīra māsa, kas savas jūtas necenšas slēpt un izaicinoši cīnās par rīdzinieka uzmanību. Savs sūrs dzīvesstāsts ir arī Lauras vīra mātei Alvīnai.

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Patiesi stāsti seriālā "Playboy noslēpumi"
programme.desc: Dokumentāls seriāls, kas atklāj glamūrīgās un spožās Hjū Hefnera "Playboy" impērijas tumšo pusi. Hjū Hefners bija veiksmīgs uzņēmējs, atbalstīja vārda brīvību, sieviešu tiesības un ar savu žurnālu mēģināja radīt seksuālu revolūciju, kas sievietes un vīriešus padarītu vienlīdzīgākus. Viņa greznajā savrupnamā dzīvoja modeles, Hjū Hefnera draudzenes, tika rīkotas grandiozas ballītes, kuras apmeklēja ietekmīgi un slaveni viesi, un daudzi par Hefneru izsakās ar apbrīnu. Dokumentālais seriāls atklāj daudz jauna un nepatīkama par "Playboy" aizkulisēm un pašu odiozo Hefneru. Atmiņās dalās bijušās modeles, Hjū Hefnera draugi un laika biedri.

programme.title: Kad viņas satiekas
programme.desc: Dzirkstošie draudzeņu sarunu vakari turpinās! Šova "Kad viņas satiekas" vadītājas Dagmāra Legante-Celmiņa, Liene Stepena un Baiba Vītiņa arī šajā sezonā aicinās ciemos sabiedrībā zināmas, spilgtas un interesantas personības, lai pačalotu par visu, kas dāmām svarīgs - attiecībām, modi, iepirkšanos un, protams, vīriešiem. Šīs sezonas jaunums - dāmas uz dzirkstošām sarunām tiksies biežāk, jau četras reizes nedēļā - katru vakaru no pirmdienas līdz ceturtdienai! Tas nozīmē vēl vairāk viesu, vairāk sarunu, vairāk dzirkstošu pārsteigumu! Tāpat kā iepriekš, dāmām pievienosies Andris Bulis, kurš uz sarunu aicinās vīriešu kārtas pārstāvjus, lai apspriestu sievietēm saistošas tēmas un izteiktu savu skatījumu par sieviešu izvēlēm.

programme.title: Kad viņas satiekas
programme.desc: Dzirkstošie draudzeņu sarunu vakari turpinās! Šova "Kad viņas satiekas" vadītājas Dagmāra Legante-Celmiņa, Liene Stepena un Baiba Vītiņa arī šajā sezonā aicinās ciemos sabiedrībā zināmas, spilgtas un interesantas personības, lai pačalotu par visu, kas dāmām svarīgs - attiecībām, modi, iepirkšanos un, protams, vīriešiem. programme.title: Что? Где? Когда?
programme.desc: По правилам, в игре принимают участие команды из шести человек, которые отвечают на вопросы телезрителей. Правильный ответ, который знатоки должны найти в течение минуты, приносит им балл. В случае неверного ответа, очко отходит команде телезрителей. В кресла знатоков в юбилейном сезоне традиционно сядут, как опытные игроки, так и новички, среди которых артисты, спортсмены, юмористы, юристы и ведущие.

programme.title: Doubling Down With the Derricos
programme.desc: Meet Deon and Karen Derrico, mom and dad to 11 kids and with triplets on the way. Their days are pretty chaotic, and in this show, viewers have a chance to see everything - ups and downs, sleepless nights, all the drama but also all the love.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Definitely not created for the squeamish, Dr Pimple Popper features dermatologist and Internet celebrity Dr. Sandra Lee as she treats patients suffering with unique skin conditions such as facial and skin disorders. Including the extraction of blackheads, cysts and uncovering new skin conditions that audiences may not have known of before, Dr. Sandra Lee started uploading content onto Youtube and Instagram, gaining a lot of popularity by people enjoying spots and cysts being popped. Those included within her videos gave written permission for her to record and post the content in exchange for discounted or free-treatments. Dr. Pimple Popper is on a mission to reclaim the lives of those suffering with these unusual and rare skin condition and remove their embarrassment.

programme.title: Body Bizarre
programme.desc: Body Bizarre is a documentary series presenting stories of people from all over the world who are suffering from unusual and mysterious disease states. Some of people need surgery that is so risky that the chances of survival are small. Some of the conditions are so rare and unstudied, that the best doctors are just puzzled and cant do anything to help. Discover the real stories of individuals living with the most incredible medical anomalies.

programme.title: Welcome To Plathville
programme.desc: Welcome To Plathville is an American reality series following husband and wife Kim and Barry Plath, and their nine children; Ethan, Hosanna, Micah, Moriah, Lydia, Isaac, Amber, Cassia, and Mercy. Apart from Ethan and Hosanna, who live with their respective spouses, the family reside on a rural farm in Georgia, where the children must abide by Kim and Barrys conservative rules. No sugar, no television, no non-religious music and no video games, the children must follow their parents strict guidelines, as family life centres around music and God. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff
programme.desc: Two of Americas most prominent baking connoisseurs whisk, beat and whip against each other to become the champion of cake. Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: Doubling Down With the Derricos
programme.desc: Meet Deon and Karen Derrico, mom and dad to 11 kids and with triplets on the way. Their days are pretty chaotic, and in this show, viewers have a chance to see everything - ups and downs, sleepless nights, all the drama but also all the love.

programme.title: Welcome To Plathville
programme.desc: Welcome To Plathville is an American reality series following husband and wife Kim and Barry Plath, and their nine children; Ethan, Hosanna, Micah, Moriah, Lydia, Isaac, Amber, Cassia, and Mercy. Apart from Ethan and Hosanna, who live with their respective spouses, the family reside on a rural farm in Georgia, where the children must abide by Kim and Barrys conservative rules. No sugar, no television, no non-religious music and no video games, the children must follow their parents strict guidelines, as family life centres around music and God. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Return To Amish
programme.desc: American reality television series, a spin-off and continuation series to Breaking Amish, that features original cast members- Abe and Rebecca Schmucker, Jeremiah Raber, and Sabrina High, who return to Pennsylvania and try to adjust to living in their Amish communities once again, facing new struggles as they come to terms with the fact that life doesnt get any easier after leaving communities behind. We also get to meet some new and interesting people, friends and family members of the original cast and follow the life of Kate Stoltz who decided to stay in New York and pursue her modeling career.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress America
programme.desc: Looking for your perfect dress? Kleinfeld Bridal is the place for you. Follow brides as they head off on their search for the perfect wedding dress, no matter how big or small in the city of New York. Bringing their friends and family along to help them decide, will they girls trip to the store be an easy one? The brides are each assisted by a consultant during a private shopping event, the outcome being that all important dress.

programme.title: Kitchen Boss
programme.desc: Hosted by Buddy Valastro, this cooking program takes various Italian-American dishes from Valastros own family recipes and shows how they can be prepared in minimal time and using ingredients that are easily obtainable and affordable. Each meal usually consists of a main course, a side dish and a dessert and Buddy is joined in the kitchen by members of his family to show us how its done and to add authenticity. Episodes feature Buddy and his wife Lisa making chicken Sorrentino with fusilli with a side of asparagus and chocolate dipped strawberries for dessert for date night; Auntie Anna revealing her secret recipes for manicotti and her chicken with vinegar peppers; or Buddy and his cousin Frankie reminiscing about the sights and food of Italian street fairs. The recipe for each dish can be found on the shows website.

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress: Lancashire
programme.desc: Its the dress that all little girls dream of, and one that most will only get chance to pick out once. A fairy tale occasion that has the ability to make dreams come true. Its also the source of tantrums, tears and arguments all wrapped up in tulle and satin with an intricate beading. A brides journey to picking out that perfect wedding gown is a near military operation. Luckily, Gok Wan has joined the expert bridal consultants at Ava Rose Hamiltons Boutique in Lancashire to help an abundance of brides-to-be track down their dream dress. But, with budgets to consider, personal issues, dramas and the opinions of the entourage, will Gok be able to help these brides find their perfect gown?

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress: Lancashire
programme.desc: Its the dress that all little girls dream of, and one that most will only get chance to pick out once. A fairy tale occasion that has the ability to make dreams come true. programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: What Now?
programme.desc: In this What Now? spin off of the American reality series 90 Day Fiancee, we revisit the lives of featured couples, checking in to see if theyre still together or if the foreign spouse has left the country. The original reality series explores marriages that have been arranged to obtain a K-1 visa, a certificate of residency uniquely available to foreign fiancees of US citizens. The visa gives the engaged couples 90 days to plan and have their respective ceremonies. These partners have never lived with each other, and these ninety days are the first real test of their relationship.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

The recipe for each dish can be found on the shows website.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: The Other Way
programme.desc: In a spin off of the US series 90 Day Fiance, Americans move to foreign countries to pursue romances and get married. In the original show, partners move into the US on a K-1 visa and have 90 days to settle before the wedding due to the visa process. This spin off sees US citizens applying for their own visas abroad, experiencing culture shocks and leaving behind their entire families for their fiance. These engagements arent without drama, secrets and lies come to light and relationships are tested to the extreme. Will these Americans find happiness and love abroad, or will they be booking a flight back home?

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: The Other Way
programme.desc: In a spin off of the US series 90 Day Fiance, Americans move to foreign countries to pursue romances and get married. programme.title: I Love a Mamas Boy

programme.title: Nate and Jeremiah by Design

programme.title: Welcome To Plathville
programme.desc: Welcome To Plathville is an American reality series following husband and wife Kim and Barry Plath, and their nine children; Ethan, Hosanna, Micah, Moriah, Lydia, Isaac, Amber, Cassia, and Mercy. Apart from Ethan and Hosanna, who live with their respective spouses, the family reside on a rural farm in Georgia, where the children must abide by Kim and Barrys conservative rules. No sugar, no television, no non-religious music and no video games, the children must follow their parents strict guidelines, as family life centres around music and God. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Match Me Abroad
programme.desc: Dolly calls Sarah out on her unrealistic expectations. Luiza sets Tony up on a blindfolded dating experiment to break his obsession with appearances.

programme.title: Kitchen Boss
programme.desc: Hosted by Buddy Valastro, this cooking program takes various Italian-American dishes from Valastros own family recipes and shows how they can be prepared in minimal time and using ingredients that are easily obtainable and affordable. Each meal usually consists of a main course, a side dish and a dessert and Buddy is joined in the kitchen by members of his family to show us how its done and to add authenticity. Episodes feature Buddy and his wife Lisa making chicken Sorrentino with fusilli with a side of asparagus and chocolate dipped strawberries for dessert for date night; Auntie Anna revealing her secret recipes for manicotti and her chicken with vinegar peppers; or Buddy and his cousin Frankie reminiscing about the sights and food of Italian street fairs. The recipe for each dish can be found on the shows website.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: Buckle up, TLC and 90 Day Fiance fans! Hot off their upcoming appearance on 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER?, fan-favorites Pedro and Chantel and their lively in-laws will be the focal point of a spinoff series from the 90 DAY FIANCÉ franchise called THE FAMILY CHANTEL, premiering Monday nights this July. Ever since Chantel first introduced Pedro to her family under the false pretense of him coming to America on a student visa, the drama that followed has kept fans obsessed. From their beginnings on 90 DAY FIANCÉ season four through 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER, Pedro and Chantel have weathered major marital ups and downs involving everything from feisty family members to their own trust issues. Viewers will follow this unique modern family as they try to move past their differences and come together as an extended family, but as Chantels parents Karen and Thomas try to protect their brood, will they push their children too far? The family members featured in the upcoming series include Chantels parents Karen and Thomas and siblings River and Winter, as well as Pedros mother Lidia and sister Nicole.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: The Other Way
programme.desc: In a spin off of the US series 90 Day Fiance, Americans move to foreign countries to pursue romances and get married. In the original show, partners move into the US on a K-1 visa and have 90 days to settle before the wedding due to the visa process. This spin off sees US citizens applying for their own visas abroad, experiencing culture shocks and leaving behind their entire families for their fiance. These engagements arent without drama, secrets and lies come to light and relationships are tested to the extreme. Will these Americans find happiness and love abroad, or will they be booking a flight back home?

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: Happily Ever After?
programme.desc: American reality series, a follow-up spinoff of 90 Day Fiance that features couples who have applied for or received a K-1 visa (available uniquely to foreign fiances of U.S. citizens) and have ninety days to marry each other, follows some of the most famous and interesting couples from the original show and documents the ups and downs of their relationships after they got married. For some of these couples, the real drama is just starting because they barely know each other and they have to battle critics, doubters, and various obstacles on their road to love. Some of the couples that are featured on the show are Danielle and Mohamed, Melanie and Devar, Loren and Alexei, Kyle and Noon, Brett and Daya and Russ and Paola.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff
programme.desc: Two of Americas most prominent baking connoisseurs whisk, beat and whip against each other to become the champion of cake. Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: What Now?
programme.desc: In this What Now? spin off of the American reality series 90 Day Fiancee, we revisit the lives of featured couples, checking in to see if theyre still together or if the foreign spouse has left the country. The original reality series explores marriages that have been arranged to obtain a K-1 visa, a certificate of residency uniquely available to foreign fiancees of US citizens. The visa gives the engaged couples 90 days to plan and have their respective ceremonies. These partners have never lived with each other, and these ninety days are the first real test of their relationship.

programme.title: Doubling Down With the Derricos
programme.desc: Meet Deon and Karen Derrico, mom and dad to 11 kids and with triplets on the way. Their days are pretty chaotic, and in this show, viewers have a chance to see everything - ups and downs, sleepless nights, all the drama but also all the love.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Documentary series surrounding Alaskas answer to its Bermuda namesake, and the mysteries that have dumbfounded experts over the years. From unsolved disappearances to purported paranormal activity, sightings of unknown creatures to claims of extraterrestrial activity, and undiscovered aircraft crashes to unknown lights in the sky, each of the mysteries are as bizarre and baffling as the next. The series features testimonies from witnesses as well as footage that claims to back up proposed theories, certifying The Alaska Triangle as one of the most mysterious places on Earth.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: Featuring a fearless crew on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions in anyway they can, Ghost Asylum follows a passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) as they attempt to "trap ghosts" in the countrys most haunted abandoned asylums, mental hospitals and sanitariums. Using their Sourthern charm and engineering knowledge to create supernatural inventions during their hunting to find ghosts or spirits of any kind. Their speciality is investigating the decaying, haunting and skin crawling mental institutions throughout the USA, warning viewers that they have permission to enter the most haunted buildings and that chasing ghosts without proper training "will get you killed", so dont try this at home.

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror
programme.desc: Tim uncovers a disturbing link between Gunslinger Gulch and a former brothel in Butte, Montana. Plus, an experiment at the ranch reveals a dark forces psychological warfare.

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Hotel
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates the secrets and legends hidden in the rooms of many hotels, motels and resorts in America. With two million hotel rooms occupied every night in America, its no wonder that some of the most captivating tales have occurred in hotels. Each episode includes dramatic recreations featuring actors re-telling the most mysterious, outrageous and strange stories and legends from Americas history that have occurred either inside the rooms, or near famous and even not-so-famous hotels.

programme.title: These Woods Are Haunted
programme.desc: The great outdoors is full of mystery and beauty, but nobody expects to run into paranormal entities or monstrous creatures during a normal day out. This documentary series examines terrifying tales where individuals have found themselves coming into contact with unexplained phenomena. What was supposed to be a pleasant trip soon turns into a nightmare, and with dramatic reconstructions, their frightening ordeals are brought to life. Each episode explores a respective story, featuring interviews with the individuals involved alongside the re-enactments.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: Featuring a fearless crew on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions in anyway they can, Ghost Asylum follows a passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) as they attempt to "trap ghosts" in the countrys most haunted abandoned asylums, mental hospitals and sanitariums. Using their Sourthern charm and engineering knowledge to create supernatural inventions during their hunting to find ghosts or spirits of any kind. Their speciality is investigating the decaying, haunting and skin crawling mental institutions throughout the USA, warning viewers that they have permission to enter the most haunted buildings and that chasing ghosts without proper training "will get you killed", so dont try this at home.

programme.title: Ghost Lab
programme.desc: Ghost Lab is an American paranormal TV series revolving around ghost-hunting brothers Brad and Barry Klinge, the founders of Everyday Paranormal- a paranormal investigation team. Their mission is to visit the most haunted places in America in order to study and investigate the afterlife and its questionable existence. The team use various equipment during their investigations, such as thermographic cameras, infrared cameras, digital audio recorders, data loggers, motion detectors, and other high tech gear.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Museum
programme.desc: Documentary series in which host Don Wildman, history enthusiast and adventurer, focuses on interesting and unusual artifacts held in museums, historical institutions, and unexplored archives around the world. Don discovers extraordinary, obscure relics and artifacts, shares their incredible stories, that have either been forgotten or are lesser known, and reveals their secrets, taking the viewers on a spectacular tour through history. We also get to find out why and how some of these unusual objects ended up in the museums.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: The team heads deep into the Alaskan Interior outside of Fairbanks to investigate reports of a gigantic bear-like creature known as the Northern Giant.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Hot on the trail of a huge feline who has been reported in the town of Paxson, Todd devises a trap, while Levi figures out a way to wirelessly trigger it.

programme.title: Kindred Spirits
programme.desc: Thrilling American paranormal docu-reality series that follows investigators Amy Bruni and Adam Berry who visit various haunted homes across the country in order to help people who are tormented by the spirits of their late relatives. These families are scared by the mysterious occurences and they will seek help from this amazing ghost-hunting duo. Amy and Adam will try to find evidence of paranormal presence, contact the spirits and provide closure for the featured family.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Building Alaska is a reality and documentary TV series following a cast of characters who set out to construct three incredible cabins in the obscure Alaskan wilderness. There are no roads and no building supply centers around, and they have to deal with extreme weather conditions, not to mention curious animals. From the foundation to doors and windows, finishing with interior work and electrical system, everything should be done, so hours and hours of hard work are ahead of the participants.

programme.title: Building Alaska

programme.title: Edge of Alaska
programme.desc: McCarthy, Alaska is home to a rugged bunch of mavericks and risk takers, willing to brave the brutal conditions in this icy, isolated town. Once a thriving, prosperous place due to the gold rush, the town is now home to a mere 40 people. There is a juxtaposition between residents; while some believe in a traditional way of life, others are desperate to drag McCarthy into the modern age, believing this is the only way to ensure its survival. Edge of Alaska tells the story of this community at a crossroads.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods with Andrew Zimmern
programme.desc: Explore remote regions of the world as you join host Andrew Zimmern on his search for Bizarre regional cuisine. Tasting and eating food that is typically perceived as disgusting, bizarre and sometimes even exotic. Each episode focuses on different countries and their regions, exploring meals that even the locals wouldnt eat. While demonstrating and discovering how the food is prepared, procured and served. Watch Andrew as he eats bugs, worms and all kinds of creepy crawlies that most people wouldnt touch with a ten-foot pole.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.desc: Mountain Monsters is an American cryptozoology-themed reality TV series revolving around the Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings team. It is a group of six skilled native West Virginian hunters and trappers. They are on a mission to study and track unidentified creatures in the Appalachian Mountains. Their main goal is to prove that mysterious creatures like Bigfoot, Werewolf, Hellhound, Lizard Man, and Mothman do exist and provide the proper evidence to the viewers.

programme.title: The Osbournes Want To Believe
programme.desc: The Osbourne family return in another reality series, this time fronted by Jack as he shows to Ozzy and Sharon some of the craziest, inexplicable videos of paranormal activity caught on camera. Although Ozzy may occasionally look like a frightening spectre, he is not the star of this series, as the videos demonstrate bizarre instances of supernatural events, with Jack testing his parents lack of beliefs when it comes to the unknown. These unexplained events have perplexed and baffled experts for years, but will Ozzy and Sharon become believers? Or will they dismiss the videos as explainable?

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror
programme.desc: Tim uncovers a disturbing link between Gunslinger Gulch and a former brothel in Butte, Montana. Plus, an experiment at the ranch reveals a dark forces psychological warfare.

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Castle
programme.desc: Find out the breathtaking stories hidden behind the doors of the most famous, notorious and impressive castles and mansions in different parts of the world. Listen to their dark secrets and mysterious legends, and visit Frankenstein Castle in Darmstadt, Germany, the Tower of London in London, England, Castello di Malaspina in Fosdinovo, Italy, Edinburgh Castle in Edinburgh, Scotland, Bran Castle in Bran, Romania and other magic spots.

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot
programme.desc: In North American folklore, upright walking, ape-like humanoid creatures roam the wilderness, dwelling just under the radar of humans. Now, four professional researchers and explorers are investigating the potential evidence of Bigfoot across the United States and Canada. Founder and president of Bigfoot Field Researchers Organisation, Matt Moneymaker, is joined by researchers James "Bobo" Fay, Cliff Barackman, and Ranae Holland on this epic inquiry into one of folklores biggest mysteries.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Documentary series. Using eye-witness accounts and new, incredible scientific evidence, In Search Of Monsters brings to life the haunting creatures that both fright and fascinate us. Narrated by Gabe Kunda, the series covers some of the most iconic and infamous monsters in folklore. From Bigfoots DNA to Nessies true whereabouts, In Search Of Monsters investigates astonishing new theories on these grisly giants.

programme.title: Treasure Quest: Snake Island
programme.desc: This reality show follows the exploits of an intrepid group of adventurers who set out to investigate a 16th century legend of lost treasure. The Treasure of the Trinity is said to be a cache of Incan gold worth hundreds of millions of dollars that is hidden off the coast of Brazil. Our team of explorers believe the treasure to be secreted away on a remote, dangerous island known to the locals as Snake Island. Using cutting-edge technology and their well-honed survival skills, the squad try to overcome the extreme risks posed by the islands population of deadly golden lancehead pit vipers, bullet ants, hazardous terrain and poachers. The clues they discover lead them to further exploits in Paraguay and Argentina.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Documentary series surrounding Alaskas answer to its Bermuda namesake, and the mysteries that have dumbfounded experts over the years. The series features testimonies from witnesses as well as footage that claims to back up proposed theories, certifying The Alaska Triangle as one of the most mysterious places on Earth.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Wonder the lengths of the globe learning all about the stories that made their homes in great kingdoms and unrivalled masterpieces, all from the comfort of your home with World Heritage. Whether its natural or man made, the interactions between the past and the present unlock a new angle from which we can observe these breathtaking sites and structures. Hosted by Travelxp, World Heritage aims to bring cutting edge travel content to travellers across the globe, bring the unseen and undiscovered into the forefront of the viewers mind. When it comes to Travelxp its all about the journey, your journey.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: For many years passion for travelling has been bringing people to unexplored continents, countries and places to look into culture, history, food, nature and people. This kind of passion if the key point of Backpack, a travel show that opens new spots all over the world by a show host travelling solo with a backpack. So make yourself comfortable and enjoy visiting Serbia, Spain, Israel, India, Egypt and many more. Take a look at the historical past and modern life, find out about traditions, get to know tourism hotspots and treasures of nature, plan your future vacations with the help of show hosts recommendations.

programme.title: Mount Kailash - The Journey Within
programme.desc: This seven-part docu-series takes the viewer on an incredible journey of discovery to the legendary Mount Kailash, the home of Lord Shiva and his consort Parvati. Beginning in Delhi, the team travel for a month, hiking through the forbidding terrain of Uttarakhand and on into the volatile climes of Tibet on their sacred adventure. Spectacular natural scenery provides a spiritual backdrop to this profound physical, emotional, and soulful experience, testing both the mind and body. Have the most profound experience of a lifetime and follow the fearless team every step of their way.

programme.title: Food Stories
programme.desc: What does the cuisine of Singapore, which has almost entirely been shaped by immigrants, tell us about the culture of the land?

programme.title: World Spas
programme.desc: Long work hours and stress definitely influence your mental and physical health. World Spas on Travelxp is a show for those who are ready to look after themselves and to relax by getting top treatments in a spa. programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: British television presenter and travel expert, Sabrina Chakici, explores the Mediterranean island of Cyprus to explore its attractions and traditions. These range from rich local cuisines loaded with culture ancient cities flooded with Greek myths, such as the city of Lazarus which has over ten thousand years of history. The city which served as Cyprus capital for the past 1100-years will also be explored. The vast Greek history within these places and masses of archaeological discoveries are explored as well as the pristine beaches that lay on the coastlines.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.desc: Bucket List is a travel program entirely dedicated to Japan, a wonderful country with unique culture and traditions, volcanoes, cuisine, lifestyle, and amazing people. The viewers who are not yet familiar with Japan will put it on their bucket list and eventually come to visit and see the one-of-a-kind localities themselves.

World Spas on Travelxp is a show for those who are ready to look after themselves and to relax by getting top treatments in a spa. Wrap yourself up in a soft bath robe, switch off your phone and enjoy to the fullest all wonders that a spa can offer, feel unique spiritual aura and energy. World Spas highlights the most exquisite spas in the world, where you can refresh and recharge your battery.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.desc: Great World Hotels takes you on a journey to the some of the worlds most luxurious hotels and resorts. We visit everything from your own personal lagoon island huts, the size of mansions, to the largest, most decadent penthouse in New York City. Live life like the stars as we explore every corner of the world from the comfort of your sofa. Season one alone takes us from Dubai to Mauritius to the Maldives. Whether youre an avid traveller or have never left the country, this journey is suitable for everyone. This is your journey. This is our journey.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer and Rohan
programme.desc: Traveler and explorer Rohan Patoley takes you to some of the most amazing hidden gems of Uttarakhand with a very special companion, his pet dog Healer. The two experience incredible adventures across Indias northern state, discovering its magnificent natural beauties, from beaches to rivers, hills and much more.

programme.title: Taco To Tikka
programme.desc: Charlies Indian culinary escapade begins in Delhi, where the citys passion for food hits him from the get-go.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: Bliss on Travelxp shows you the best destinations across the globe. Take a wonderful trip to the beautiful beaches, enjoy vast landscapes, try amazing mouthwatering dishes. The host takes you around places to reveal their distinctive architecture, castles and gardens. Revel in a holiday of your dreams and discover the most luxurious hotels in Greece, Austria, India, Bulgaria, Turkey and much more.

programme.title: Best from the Rest
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world even on a holiday we are always short of time and in a rush. Best From the Rest on TravelXP will filter the information to save you every single minute so that you wont miss a thing. The show highlights top five places or activities that deserve your full attention in various cities all over the world. From top 5 romantic places in Mauritius, 5 best things to do when in Dubai, to 5 must see destinations in Hong Kong, 5 most sacred temples in the state of Rajasthan and 5 new adventures in Jordan. Every signature episode will take your breath away.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.desc: Bucket List is a travel program entirely dedicated to Japan, a wonderful country with unique culture and traditions, volcanoes, cuisine, lifestyle, and amazing people. Paddy Doherty and Daniel Coll are active in the British and Irish media, visit Japan and experience various things in each region, while encountering challenges that make them confront their own phobias and fears. The viewers who are not yet familiar with Japan will put it on their bucket list and eventually come to visit and see the one-of-a-kind localities themselves.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.desc: Great World Hotels takes you on a journey to the some of the worlds most luxurious hotels and resorts. We visit everything from your own personal lagoon island huts, the size of mansions, to the largest, most decadent penthouse in New York City. Live life like the stars as we explore every corner of the world from the comfort of your sofa. Season one alone takes us from Dubai to Mauritius to the Maldives. Whether youre an avid traveller or have never left the country, this journey is suitable for everyone. This is your journey. This is our journey.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Documentary series. Join host Alexandra Outhwaite has she journeys through the wonderfully cultural country of Spain. The seventh most populous country in Europe, Spain is home to over 45 million people, and this series covers the countrys three biggest cities: Madrid, Barcelona and Valencia. Alexandra dives into the local way of life to find out what makes Spain such an attractive prospect for tourists. With its pristine beaches, exquisite cuisine, stunning landscapes and festive fiestas, Spain is certainly one Europes hottest destinations to explore.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer and Rohan

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: British television presenter and travel expert, Sabrina Chakici, explores the Mediterranean island of Cyprus to explore its attractions and traditions. These range from rich local cuisines loaded with culture ancient cities flooded with Greek myths, such as the city of Lazarus which has over ten thousand years of history. The city which served as Cyprus capital for the past 1100-years will also be explored. The vast Greek history within these places and masses of archaeological discoveries are explored as well as the pristine beaches that lay on the coastlines.

programme.title: 72 Hours Unplugged
programme.desc: Prague looks like a fairy tale — but Pilars not here for the postcards. Shes chasing the citys secrets.

programme.title: Christmas Market
programme.desc: Experience the magic of Strasbourgs Christmas market, Frances oldest and most enchanting holiday destination with Emeline.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: City Breaks is a travel show that guides you through most astonishing cities of the world to show their rich history and culture and inspires you to explore everything a city has to offer on a city break, its cuisine, shopping spots, wonderful views, historical values. From picturesque old towns to modern young cities, City breaks has it all- Munich, Budapest, Samarkand, Madrid, Dubai and much more. Take a rest and take a city break, you wont regret a single second.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: Taking the visitor behind the scenes of well-known and popular tourist destinations, Food Fact Fun explores the cuisine and culture of cities the world over through a lively and adventurous look at the hidden side of culinary travel; shining some light on the facts and fun that can be learned and enjoyed while travelling in a culinary way through varied cultures and parts of the world.

programme.title: Нюхач
programme.desc: Он обладает сверхчувствительным обонянием, для него не существует тайн и нераскрываемых преступлений. По запаху Нюхач может рассказать все и даже больше о любом человеке.

programme.title: Роман с детективом
programme.desc: Школьница Сашка попадает в секту к лже-гуру Изюмову, который соблазняет девушку. Сашка ждёт от него ребёнка.

programme.title: Мистические истории
programme.desc: Каждая серия состоит из двух историй. Все они основаны на реальных событияхпересказанные так, как услышаны от реальных участников описываемых событий либо от экстрасенсов, работавших с участниками. В проекте задействованы различные специалисты, которые анализируют происходящие в кадре события, и высказывают свое мнение. Здесь и психологи, и экстрасенсы, и биоэнергетики, и врачи, и даже ведьмы. Каждый из них имеет свое собственное видение происходящего - они лишь озвучивают свои мнения. Вывод о том, кто прав, и действительно ли в основе рассказанных историй лежит мистика, или же результат самовнушения, — делает сам зритель.

programme.title: Мистические истории

programme.title: Вскрытие покажет
programme.desc: Судмедэксперт Инга Вилкас — настоящая супер-профи от ее внимательного взгляда не скроется ни одно доказательство. Раскрывать преступления ей приходится вместе со следователем Олегом Гончаром. На первый взгляд их дуэт слишком противоречив: девушка то и дело направляет свои шипы на коллегу, а он их жестко отвергает. Но, в работе эта парочка отлично дополняет друг друга.

programme.desc: Raidījums "Cilvēks. Ceļš. Drošība" skaidro, informē un izglīto par ceļu satiksmi. Ar nozares ekspertiem diskutējam, kā uzlabot satiksmes drošību Latvijā, runājam par sabiedrības mobilitātes paradumiem un ziņojam par aktualitātēm, kas svarīgas gan autovadītājam, gan elektriskā skrejriteņa lietotājam, gan gājējam!

programme.title: Grāmatu kods
programme.desc: Par jaunāko literatūru Latvijā un pasaulē, aktuālām un izglītojošām tēmām kopā ar rakstniekiem, sabiedrībā populāriem cilvēkiem un apgāda Zvaigzne ABC pārstāvjiem.

programme.title: Kārtības rullis
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums "Kārtības rullis" - ētera personība Armands Puče ar viesiem diskutē par to, kā tiek virzīti procesi Latvijā un kā tiek pieņemti lēmumi, kas ietekmē visas Latvijas tautas dzīvi.

programme.title: Uz līnijas
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījumā "Uz līnijas" iepazīsim aktuālas un interesantas Latvijas personības. Uzdod savu jautājumu tiešraidē pa studijas tālruni 67630301!

programme.title: Kur tas suns aprakts?
programme.desc: Žurnālists Māris Zanders ar diviem politiskās dzīves pazinējiem-ekspertiem pārspriež un ironizē par nedēļas politikas aktualitātēm Latvijā un pasaulē.

programme.title: Globuss
programme.desc: Raidījums "Globuss" reizi nedēļā skaidro ārpolitikas un starptautiskās aktualitātes, no kurām izriet arī Latvijas politiskā, ekonomiskā, tautsaimniecības un kultūras pozīcija un pārmaiņas.

programme.title: Dr. Apinis
programme.desc: Par medicīnu kā par zinātni, praksi, pieredzi, empātiju, pārvaldību un mākslu. Dr. Pēteris Apinis sarunāsies ar Latvijas un pasaules medicīnas guru.

programme.title: Radio Svoboda
programme.desc: Mumins Šakirovs ir pieredzējis žurnālists un dokumentālo filmu veidotājs, kurš strādājis daudzos nozīmīgos pasākumos un karstajos punktos. Kopā ar ekspertiem viņš katru sestdienu sadala svarīgākās Krievijas un pasaules ziņas. Politika un ekonomika, kultūra un zinātne. Cenšoties saviem skatītājiem sniegt pilnvērtīgu un skaidru priekšstatu par notikumiem, nodalot svarīgus notikumus no informatīvā trokšņa.
